about_the_game:
Trapped in a paranormal-infested shopping centre in the middle of nowhere, your goal is to survive! With a lurking horrific late-night shopper searching the empty corridors, you must evade dying and stop the cycle.



You must be versatile. Run and use hiding spaces to your advantage to escape the monster patrolling the shopping centre. Or use the variety of items left behind by other trapped mortals to get through the multiple levels of the shopping centre.



Every time you die, the cycle restarts. It is permadeath. With every cycle, the horror evolves. Your goal is to escape in as few cycles as possible….if you enjoy your sanity.



New cycle, new mortal. From a scientist to lost children, every time a new cycle begins a new mortal is challenged with escaping the shopping centre. Equipped with unique items or unique gameplay features each mortal brings something to a cycle.



Venture through multiple levels of the shopping centre in search of a means of escape or to end this nightmare...



Don’t die for nothing. Unlock secret passageways and broken doors that remain open in every cycle. Mortals will then be able to move around the map more efficiently…but so will the monster.



What could be worse than a monster? Paranormal entities playing tricks on your mind. Nothing in this shopping centre can be trusted, the environment will be constantly changing and devious events are throughout.

New cycle, new mortal. From a scientist to lost children, every time a new cycle begins a new mortal is challenged with escaping the shopping centre. Equipped with unique items or unique gameplay features each mortal brings something to a cycle.

name: Mauled

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 9700k
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Mauled is a first-person survival horror game where players are stuck in an endless loop of death trying to escape a horrific late-night shopper...
